game.title: Minecraft
game.synopsis: A group of players must survive in a blocky world, crafting, mining, and battling various creatures, including zombies.
game.beginning: The player starts in a randomly generated world, with a small amount of resources and必须探索, build, and defend themselves against the dangers of the world.
game.ending: In this open-world game, there is no specific ending. Players create their own goals, such as building grand structures or surviving for as long as possible.
